::Koj::

Koj looks at the kid not having much experience with them just hearing Lilly 
say she one day she wanted one. "I'm Koj a maximal and your friend if you 
would let me be?" Koj looks at Hellbeast and see the pred mark starts 
thinking if hellbeast gets the kid he may use her a advantage against Koj in 
combat.  "I'm also a Super hero yeah I'm here to help you find your Ma and 
Pa." Koj starting to sound like a little kid himself and starts to allow his 
heart and soul to show alittle as his eyes become warm to try to show he is 
telling the truth.
